title: 超能物质，引力异常点
author: lidairen
txt_content: 如何修改超能物质mod里引力异常点的生成几率

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
.minecraft\config\MatterOverdrive\MatterOverdrive.cfg

中，修改
        # Spawn Chance of Gravity Anomaly pre chunk [range: 0.0 ~ 1.0, default: 0.05]
        S:"gravitational anomaly spawn chance"=0.05

数值越大几率越大

replies.author: CheatDiamond
replies.txt_content:
lidairen 发表于 2019-10-26 21:50
调哪个数值S:"gravitational anomaly spawn chance"=0.05
红色这边是调整的地方，最大数值为1
